name: Midare Ranzan: Electro
description:
The next time you use Switch Character to switch to the character to which this is attached: This switch is considered a Fast Action rather than a Combat Action.
Before you choose an action: If the character to which this is attached is your active character, they immediately use a Normal Attack. The Physical DMG this Normal Attack would deal is converted to Electro DMG. Once finalized, this effect is removed.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The next time you use Switch Character to switch to the character to which this is attached:</color> This switch is considered a $[K2] rather than a $[K1].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Before you choose an action:</color> If the character to which this is attached is your active character, they immediately use a Normal Attack. The $[K100] this Normal Attack would deal is converted to $[K104]. Once finalized, this effect is removed.

The {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> this Normal Attack would deal is converted to {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>. Once finalized, this effect is removed.
